remarks: The scalar of the final constructed Hilbert space.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhilbase.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhilbase.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilbase.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhilsca.e $e |- E = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilsca.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilsca.r $e |- R = ( E sSet <. ( *r ` ndx ) , G >. ) $.
hlhilsca $p |- ( ph -> R = ( Scalar ` U ) ) $.
